Issue.creator: tongliofcary
Issue.summary: Allow OpenStack provisioning module not to sign VM public IP
Issue.description: Currently the OpenStack provision module always assumes that the public IP is needed to access VMs. However, in some test cases, the public IP is not needed and preferred not to use the resources. We need to add a flag to indicate if the public IP on VM is needed. Public IPs should only be allocated/requested when the flag set to true. The default should be true as well.
